title: The Middle East & North Africa Stevie® AwardsMiddle East & North Africa Stevie® Awards | The Middle East & North Africa Stevie® Awards
content:
The Middle East & North Africa Stevie® Awards, sponsored by the Ras Al Khaimah Chamber of Commerce & Industry, are an international business awards competition that is open to all organizations in 18 nations in the Middle East and North Africa. The focus of the awards is on recognizing innovation in all its forms.

The 2027 edition will begin accepting nominations this summer. Request your Entry Kit to learn how to submit nominations and join the ranks of prestigious industry leaders like Almarai, DHL Express, Halkbank, Ooredoo and Saudi Aramco.

Temporary winners notified

Temporary winners notified

Deadline for payment of winners fees

Deadline for payment of winners fees

Winners Publicly Announced

Winners Publicly Announced

2026 Awards Banquet Istanbul, Türkiye

2026 Awards Banquet Istanbul, Türkiye

Stand out to clients and competitors by entering the 7th annual Middle East & North Africa Stevie® Awards — the region’s premier business awards honoring innovation and achievement across 18 nations, including Algeria, Bahrain, Egypt, Jordan, Kuwait, Morocco, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Turkiye, the United Arab Emirates, and more. Open to all organizations and professionals, the MENA Stevies celebrate the best in business across the region.

Choose from 200+ award categories honoring outstanding achievements in leadership, innovation, technology, customer service, new products & services, marketing, and more including:

A MENA Stevie® Award is more than a trophy; it’s a powerful symbol of innovation, leadership, and competitive edge in the region’s fast-moving business landscape. Each year, industry leaders like QNB Finansbank, RAK Ceramics and STC (Saudi Telecom Company) are celebrated alongside high-potential startups and SMEs across the Middle East & North Africa.

Winners in the 2025 Middle East & North Africa Stevie® Awards Announced

2025 Middle East & North Africa Stevie® Award Winners Honored at Ceremony in Ras Al Khaimah

Grand Stevie® Award Winners Announced in the 2025 Middle East & North Africa Stevie® Awards

Winning a Stevie® Award gives you and your team the opportunity to showcase your achievements before a worldwide audience. At the 6th annual gala held on 22 February 2025 in Ras Al Khaimah, United Arab Emirates, more than 300 winners, judges, and guests from 68 organizations came together to celebrate excellence across the region.

Winners in the 2026 competition will join professionals from leading organizations around the world at the awards gala on 14 May 2026 in Istanbul, Turkiye. While attendance is not required to win, all winners are invited to take the stage to accept their Stevie Awards, deliver an acceptance speech, and be professionally photographed and interviewed on our red carpet. The ceremony will be live-streamed globally, offering winners visibility far beyond the event itself. Visit our FAQ page to learn more about the awards gala.

Whatever your organization is seeking recognition for, there is a Stevie Awards program and category for it. From individual professionals and teams to departments and company-wide accomplishments, each of our nine awards programs feature hundreds of categories recognizing excellence across every facet of work life.

The International Business Awards are open to all organizations worldwide, and include categories to honor accomplishments in all aspects of work life.

ENTRIES OPEN: July 2026

The Stevie Awards for Sales & Customer Service are open to all organizations worldwide, and recognize the achievements of sales, customer service, and call center professionals.

ENTRIES OPEN: February 26, 2026

The Stevie Awards for Great Employers are open to all organizations worldwide, and recognize the world's best companies to work for and the HR teams and professionals, HR achievements, new products and services, and suppliers who help to create and drive great workplaces.

ENTRIES OPEN: March 11, 2026

The Stevie Awards for Technology Excellence celebrate the remarkable accomplishments of individuals, teams, and organizations shaping the future of technology across all industry sectors. Individuals and organizations worldwide are eligible to enter - public and private, for-profit and non-profit, large and small.

ENTRIES OPEN: May 12, 2026

The Stevie Awards for Women in Business are open to all organizations worldwide, and recognize the achievements of women executives, entrepreneurs, and the organizations they run.

ENTRIES OPEN: October 2026

The Asia-Pacific Stevie Awards are open to all organizations in the 29 markets of the Asia-Pacific region.

All U.S.-based organizations are eligible to participate in the top business awards program in the U.S.A.

ENTRIES OPEN: March 26, 2026

The German Stevie Awards are open to all organizations in the European nations in which German is an official language: Austria, Belgium, Germany, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, and Switzerland.

The best way to stay on top of deadlines, extensions, and program updates is by subscribing to our free, weekly newsletter.

Questions? Problems? Contact Us. Read Our Refunds & Delivery Policy. Our privacy policy is available here. Copyright © 2026 Stevie Awards, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
